subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Vijay Singh, the former No. 1 player in the world, has not won a tournament since last July, but he shot a seven-under-par 64 to share the second-round lead, at eight-under 134, with David Howell, who shot 68, at the Barclays Classic.
snippet: Vijay Singh, the former No. 1 player in the world, has not won a tournament since last July, but he shot a seven-under-par 64 to share the second-round lead, at eight-under 134, with David Howell, who shot 68, at the Barclays Classic.
